label: 兵衛府
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The corps (divided into Left [Sahyōefu] and Right [Uhyōefu]) of guards charged with maintaining general security in the palace compound and in the city at large.  The senior officer was the Intendant (junior fourth rank, lower grade), followed by the Second (junior fifth rank, upper grade).[左兵衛府、右兵衛府][RK]
